circumstances: Richard Williams was last seen leaving his home on Turret Crescent. Before his disappearance, Richard had been involved in a legal dispute that involved his foster situation. It was also reported that he had contacted a stranger, which raised concerns given his age. He was last known to be visiting a relative’s house near Balmuildy Road, G64 3HD, and was meant to return home shortly thereafter. A friend of the family, Joanna, mentioned that he appeared anxious during their last meeting. After an extensive search, Richard was eventually traced to an address on Bassett Avenue, Glasgow, where he was found safe and returned to the proper authorities. The incident highlighted the importance of maintaining open communication within his support network.
